original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, users as u WHERE c.UserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-09 07:24:50' AS TIMESTAMP) AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 03:46:02' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Views<=80 AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-02 20:31:12' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-09 07:24:50' AND CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 03:46:02'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation >= 1 AND users.Views <= 80 AND users.UpVotes >= 0 AND users.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-02 20:31:12'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3.UserId=E2.UserId)
